title: Clarity
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                    |
| - | ---------------------------------- |
|   | It protects you against confusion. |

**Clarity** is an [intrinsic](/Intrinsic "Intrinsic") which protects you from most sources of [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion"), [mesmerisation](/Mesmerise "Mesmerise"), [fear](/Fear "Fear"), [sleep](/Sleep "Sleep"), and from going [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") unwillingly (though you may still intentionally go berserk as normal).

Clarity does **not** protect you from the following:

- Mesmerisation caused by the [obsidian axe](/Obsidian_axe "Obsidian axe")
- Confusion inflicted by [Xom](/Xom "Xom")
- Confusion caused by [potions of ambrosia](/Potions_of_ambrosia "Potions of ambrosia")
- Intentional berserk ([potion of berserk rage](/Potion_of_berserk_rage "Potion of berserk rage"), [Trog](/Trog "Trog") ability)

You can acquire clarity from the following sources:

- [Ashenzari](/Ashenzari "Ashenzari") grants clarity at \*\*\* [piety](/Piety "Piety")

- The [Clarity](/Clarity_\(mutation\) "Clarity (mutation)") [mutation](/Mutation "Mutation")

- From certain [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") artefacts:

  - [![Amulet of the four winds.png](/images/a/a5/Amulet_of_the_four_winds.png)](/File:Amulet_of_the_four_winds.png) **[Amulet of the Four Winds](/Amulet_of_the_Four_Winds "Amulet of the Four Winds")**
  - [![Orange crystal plate armour.png](/images/a/a0/Orange_crystal_plate_armour.png)](/File:Orange_crystal_plate_armour.png) **[Orange crystal plate armour](/Orange_crystal_plate_armour "Orange crystal plate armour")**
  - [![Victory.png](/images/6/6b/Victory.png)](/File:Victory.png) **[Victory](/Victory "Victory")**

## Strategy

Immunity to multiple statuses, namely confusion and sleep, is nice. But most things that clarity protects against can also be blocked with sufficient [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") (the [Confuse](/Confuse "Confuse") and [Sleep](/Sleep "Sleep") spells, mesmerise, fear) or rPois ([Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud")). Having clarity can help if you don't have these, but since sources of clarity are so rare, it's usually more of a bonus than anything. [Mummies](/Mummies "Mummies") find it particularly valuable, since they can't drink a [potion of curing](/Potion_of_curing "Potion of curing") to end confusion.

Clarity is the only way to prevent confusion from [tarantellas](/Tarantella "Tarantella"), and one of the few ways to prevent sleep from [dream sheep](/Dream_sheep "Dream sheep").

## History

- In [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), clarity once again blocks all sources of unintentional berserk. Also, the [autumn katana](/Autumn_katana "Autumn katana") lost clarity.
- In [0.27](/0.27 "0.27").1, clarity does not protect against going berserk when using items with the berserkitis intrinsic (such as the [zealot's sword](/Zealot%27s_sword "Zealot's sword") or the [necklace of Bloodlust](/Necklace_of_Bloodlust "Necklace of Bloodlust")).
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), clarity did not protect against fear and sleep.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), clarity made potions of ambrosia useless. The [amulet of clarity](/Amulet_of_clarity "Amulet of clarity") was also removed.

Clarity

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
It protects you against confusion.

Clarity is an intrinsic which protects you from most sources of confusion, mesmerisation, fear, sleep, and from going berserk unwillingly (though you may still intentionally go berserk as normal).

Clarity does not protect you from the following:

  • Mesmerisation caused by the obsidian axe
  • Confusion inflicted by Xom
  • Confusion caused by potions of ambrosia
  • Intentional berserk (potion of berserk rage, Trog ability)

You can acquire clarity from the following sources:

  • Ashenzari grants clarity at *** piety
  • The Clarity mutation
  • From certain unrand artefacts:
    • Amulet of the Four Winds
    • Orange crystal plate armour
    • Victory

Strategy

Immunity to multiple statuses, namely confusion and sleep, is nice. But most things that clarity protects against can also be blocked with sufficient willpower (the Confuse and Sleep spells, mesmerise, fear) or rPois (Mephitic Cloud). Having clarity can help if you don't have these, but since sources of clarity are so rare, it's usually more of a bonus than anything. Mummies find it particularly valuable, since they can't drink a potion of curing to end confusion.

Clarity is the only way to prevent confusion from tarantellas, and one of the few ways to prevent sleep from dream sheep.

History

  • In 0.28, clarity once again blocks all sources of unintentional berserk. Also, the autumn katana lost clarity.
  • In 0.27.1, clarity does not protect against going berserk when using items with the berserkitis intrinsic (such as the zealot's sword or the necklace of Bloodlust).
  • Prior to 0.19, clarity did not protect against fear and sleep.
  • Prior to 0.18, clarity made potions of ambrosia useless. The amulet of clarity was also removed.
